sub_title: Global Marketing Leader. Digital transformation| Executive MBA
summary: Global Digital Marketing Leader with 10+ years of management and leadership experience in all things Digital, E-Commerce and DTC. Located in Amsterdam and currently supporting Philips in launching and localizing the main NPIs at a Global level. In 1 year with Philips, I created a performance Dashboard from scratch and deployed it for the main E-commerce markets, roll-out OneBlade NPIs globally, roll-out more AB tests globally, roll-out a CRM project globally which contributed to the increase in CVR and OR. Before I joined Philips, I led a team of seven people who are in charge with the execution of the online marketing strategy. I contributed to the growth of the E-commerce’s share in the company's revenue in the last 5 years and to the growth of the E-commerce business by developing its online communication & marketing strategy and managing its execution. I graduated from an Executive MBA program at IEDC Bled School of Management in Slovenia, in 2019.

treasury_media.title: Mai aproape de casele noastre de vis
treasury_media.description:
De când ne știm, ne punem toată energia în micile noastre împărății. Organizăm petreceri fastuoase și alegem să împărțim magia doar cu cei care pot visa departe, la fel ca noi. 
#Mobexpert ne aduce mai aproape de casele noastre...de vis!
www.mobexpert.ro

treasury_media.title: Oamenii Mobexpert - Miruna Mitu
treasury_media.description: #OameniiMobexpert Vă facem cunoștință cu oamenii care se află în spatele Mobexpert, cei care vă ajută să vă mobilați casele pe gustul vostru. Miruna Mitu: „Dacă îți dorești să crești, dacă îți dorești să te dezvolți, Mobexpert îți va pune la...

profile_positions.description:
- Coordinating creation of new web pages and e-mail marketing campaigns, collaborating with functions across the organization, e.g. Design, IT & Digital Services.
- Deployment of (new) content towards countries in the regional marketing hub.
- Establishing & managing relationships within the regional marketing hub, and driving the agenda of the activation team as the designated Owned Media and E-Trade representative.
- Improving consumer experience of Philips products at online retailers, with a strong focus on Amazon (A+) product content.
- Growing our consumer database with e-mail marketing opt-in and increasing the “consumer life-time value”.
- Improving the Philips.com performance, with a focus on growing our D2C sales.
- Deployment and syndication of our content across multiple channels ( internal, external and worldwide).
- Actively monitoring and reporting on the performance of the owned media touchpoints.
- Defining, creating and executing user tests (e.g. A/B and multi-variant tests & qualitative tests) to improve the consumer experience.
- Using the Agile Scrum methodology to plan and execute the work.
profile_positions.title: Global Digital Marketing & Ecommerce Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Leading a team of 7 people that implements the online communication and marketing plan and manages the online presence in relevant social networking platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, Pinterest, Twitter, LinkedIn) and developed the team from 2 to 7 members
- Administrating the online & communication marketing budget
- Managing the production of the branding TV commercial 
- Initiated and created the Mobexpert Blog: https://mobexpert.ro/pages/idei-si-inspiratie-pentru-casa-ta 
- Created email marketing flows 
- Working with the performance marketing agencies to develop the PPC strategy and SEO strategy and managing budgets and contracts for all paid campaigns
- Coordinating and assisting the web design team in creating content for digital and social marketing
- Collecting and analyzing data, identifying trends and insights in order to achieve the maximum revenue in marketing campaigns 
- Analyzing, tracking (Google Analytics) and improving conversions by developing the online strategy and promoting the brand on every digital medium
- RFM customer segmentation - building a sustainable relationship with our customers and focus on increasing the average order value and profitability by giving them the right incentives
- Elaborating and interpreting monthly, trimestral, biannual and annual reports referring to performance of online marketing & communication channels and materials
- Managing the online marketing partnerships with third parties and partnerships with the biggest influencers in Romania and media channels
- Preparing and implementing the launch campaigns for new products (ex. Mobexpert Tiny House - 2021 new product)
- Creating from scratch the annual report for Mobexpert in 2020
- Creating and implementing the communication strategy for other Mobexpert projects which are not in the furniture industry (ex. real estate)
- Speaker in more than 20 professional events globally
